summary: Futures of Dow Jones Industrial Average, S&P 500, Nasdaq 100 flatlined . President Trump weighing up his search for a successor to Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell . Powell's term ends in May 2026 .  The main event for Wall Street to end the week lands Friday with the release of the Fed's preferred inflation gauge, the Personal Consumption Expenditures (PCE) report . The dollar has hit a low against the euro that hasn't been reached in over three and a half years .

Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. is set to inject $10 billion capital to its overseas unit to shore up forex hedging operations . It’s the third such deal since 2024, and by far the largest by far . TSMC Global Ltd. has approved a plan to increase its capital by issuing new shares to its parent .  Recent strength in the Taiwan dollar has caused worries in Taipei about the economy’s heavy reliance on exports . In May, the currency notched its biggest single-day gain since the 1980s, spurring calls from the central bank to curb speculation .  TSMC, the main chipmaker to Apple Inc. and Nvidia Corp., is by far the island’s biggest company and exporter . A stronger Taiwan dollar hurts exporters because the US dollars they earn from sales abroad would translate into less of the local currency .  Gap can also fund its US asset and expansion plans with less FX conversion risk, says a foreign-exchange strategist at Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp Ltd. “It can also . fund their US asset . and expansion plan with less currency conversion risk," he says .

STRADVISION's flagship software product, SVNet, was honored as a winner in the 2025 AI Breakthrough Awards . SVNet is a lightweight AI-driven perception technology for the automotive industry . The 2025 program marked a record-setting level of competition .  STRADVISION's SVNet meets rigorous performance standards required for ADAS and autonomous driving systems . SVNet is a powerful deep learning-based perception software that enables real-time object detection and classification .  STRADVISION is an automotive industry pioneer in artificial intelligence-based vision perception technology for ADAS . SVNet is being deployed on various vehicle models in partnership with OEMs .  STRADVISION and its software have achieved TISAX's AL3 standard for information security management . The company has also been certified to ISO 9001:2015 for Quality Management Systems and ISO 26262 for Automotive Functional Safety .

Shares of AI powerhouse Nvidia Corp. (NVDA) surged to a new all-time high on Wednesday . The stock closed at $154.31, topping its previous record closing high of $149.43 set in January . The breakout suggests renewed investor enthusiasm as the AI boom shows no signs of slowing .  Nvidia is now the most valuable company in the world, with a market capitalization of $3.8 trillion . It now accounts for over 7% of theSPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust (SPY) and nearly 9% of QQQ Trusts .  2025etf has amassed $3.8 billion in assets . Still, NVDL remains more than 20% below its highs due to the effects of compounding and daily reset mechanics .

Dow slipped 106 points, -0.25%, while S&P 500 was exactly unched — 0.0% — on the day . Nasdaq gained +61 points, +0.31%, while the small-cap Russell 2000 closed at session lows . Fed Chair Jerome Powell appeared before the Senate Banking Committee to discuss the possibility of cutting rates .  Data storage giant MicronMU.MU. posted a whopping +171% year over year . Micron raised guidance for its fiscal Q4 for earnings of between $2.35-2.65 per share and $10.4-11.0 billion in revenues far beyond the $9.9 billion consensus .  Shares had already been up +51.2% year to date, and are up another +4% in late trading . Expect this Zacks Rank #3 (Hold)-based stock to ratchet up a bit in the days to come .  After spending much of 2025 chopping back and forth between 1.85-1.9 million, the past two weeks have shot up to a new range around 1.95 million . If this comes back down we won’t make too much of it . touching that 2 million level on longer-term jobless claims will have a psychological effect on markets .

Paychex shares tumbled as the human resources service provider missed quarterly sales estimates and trimmed its full-year forecasts . Shares of Super Micro Computer bounced back from losses posted in the previous session after the server maker said it would issue convertible notes .  Shares of artificial intelligence semiconductor behemoth Nvidia (NVDA) jump 4.3%, lifting the stock to its highest-ever close . Paychex (PAYX) shares drop 9.4%, losing the most of any S&P 500 stock, after the payroll and human resources services provider reported lower-than-expected sales .  General Mills missed fiscal fourth-quarter sales estimates and projected alarger-than-anticipated profit decline in fiscal 2026 . Paychex also provided full-year sales and profit guidance that came in below consensus estimates . Tesla (TSLA) stock slipped 3.8% after the automaker's new car registrations in the European Union were down more than 40% year-over-year in May .  Super Micro Computer (SMCI) shares soared 8.8%, logging the top daily performance in the S&P 500 . Northern Trust (NTRS) stock advanced 4.8% following news that Bank of New York Mellon (BK) had approached the smaller wealth and asset management firm about a potential merger .  Northern Trust has said that it is committed to remaining independent . Northern Trust said it was not believed to be a trust in the trust . The trust has said it will remain independent in future .

Global stocks were mixed Wednesday as markets weighed lingering worries about the Iran-Israel conflict . Nvidia surged to a fresh all-time high on bullishness over artificial intelligence . The chip company shot up 4.3 percent to $154.31, giving it a market valuation of around $3.76 .  Asian stock markets had closed higher earlier on Wednesday following rallies on Wall Street and in Europe the day before . European stocks fell in Wednesday's session, with fewer benefits from the flight to safety due to unrest in the Middle East . Oil prices advanced after two days of heavy losses following a US crude inventory report that showed a bigger than expected drawdown in inventory .  Brent North Sea Crude: Up 0.8 percent at $67.68 per barrel West Texas Intermediate: UP 0.9 percent at  $64.92 per barrel New York - Dow: DOWN 0.3 percent at 42,982.43 (close) London - FTSE 100: Down 0.5 percent at 8,718.75 . Paris - CAC 40: DOWN . Frankfurt - DAX: DOWN.6 percent at 23,498.33 (Close) Tokyo - Nikkei 225: Up . 4 percent at 38,942 .  Euro/pound: DOWN at 85.26 from 85.27 pence burs-jmb/des . Euro/Japan yen down at 144.94 yen .

Nvidia (NVDA) is listed as a visionary speaker at an AI innovation summit CoreWeave (CRWV) is hosting today, June 26 . Shares of the chipmaker are trading at record levels at the time of writing .  Ananda Baruah raised his price target on Nvidia shares to $250, indicating potential upside of another 65% from current levels . Note that the artificial intelligence behemoth will be worth $6 trillion over the next 12 months . Other Wall Street analysts remain notably constructive on the second half of 2025 as well .  According to Barchart, the consensus rating on NVDA stock currently sits at “Strong Buy” with the mean target of about $175 indicating potential upside of about 13% from here .

The S&P 500 came just shy from its February record of 6,144.15 to gain 0.8%, closing the session at 6,141.02 . The Nasdaq Composite (^IXIC) moved up more than 1%, finishing within a handful of points from its own record . Nvidia stock (NVDA) was up 1%, building on its Wednesday high .  The US economy shrank 0.5% in the first quarter, worse than previously thought . Jobless claims rose to their highest level since late 2021 . The dollar retreated to its lowest levels since April 2022 .  The S&P 500 (^GSPC) inched closer to a record close on Thursday . The broad-based index added about 0.8%, coming just shy of its February record close . The Dow Jones Industrial Average added 0.9% or 400 points . The Nasdaq Composite also gained nearly 1%, buoyed by shares of AI chip giant Nvidia .  Economists see an increase in continuing claims as a sign that those out of work are taking longer to find new jobs . "Employment risks are trending higher," Jefferies US economist Thomas Simons wrote in a note to clients .  Nvidia-backed AI cloud firm CoreWeave is in talks to acquire Core Scientific, the Wall Street Journal reports . Core Scientific went bankrupt in 2022 butemerged after restructuringin 2024 . The gains come after the company announced a breakthrough in its process for manufacturing solid-state lithium-metal batteries . Last year, Core Scientific rejected the "unsolicited" proposal to buy Core Scientific .  CoreWeave is one of the largest holders of Nvidia's (NVDA) graphics processing units and rents its data center capacity to Big Tech firms such as Microsoft (MSFT) and Meta (META) Microsoft and Meta announced a "series of 12-year contracts" for Core Scientific to host Core Scientific's Nvidia GPUs . Mortgage rates dropped for the fourth consecutive week as geopolitical tensions eased and Treasury yields fell .  Shares traded at nearly $224 by midday, up 620% for the month but below the stock's record close above $263 on Monday . The US Senate passed the GENIUS Act last week that would establish a federal framework for digital tokens backed by assets such as the US dollar .  All three major averages were higher in afternoon trading . The S&P 500 was trading just a stone's throw away from its record close from February . President Trump has signaled some leeway in the July 9 tariff deadline .  AI chip giant Nvidia (NVDA) stock continued to tick higher Thursday . The gains come amid bullish predictions for the AI chip market on Wall Street . Analyst Ananda Baruah on Wednesday raised his price target on Nvidia shares to $250 .  Nvidia (NVDA) stock was up marginally and on track to build on itsrecord high from Wednesday . Walgreens Boots Alliance stock (WBA) gained less than 1% in premarket . President Trump appeared to get closer to naming his replacement for Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell .  Walgreens reported revenue of $39 billion, beating estimates for $36.8 billion . Store closures and cost-cutting efforts boosted profits to $0.38 per share . The pharmacy chain is being taken private by Sycamore Partners in a $10 billion deal .  Platinum (PL=F) futures surged to their highest level since 2014, rising more than 5% at one point to as high as $1,411.80 per ounce . Year to date, platinum futures have climbed around 56% as supply concerns have driven the metal higher .  Nike (NKE) is set to report its fiscal fourth quarter earnings after market close today . Wall Street is bracing for more poor results . Read more here .  Nvidia (NVDA)stock was up 1% in premarket trading on Thursday after notching a new record high of $154.31 on Wednesday . Micron (MU) stock was up over 2% before the bell after delivering third-quarter results that exceeded estimates .

The AI networking space is heating up in 2025, and not in a way that favors everyone . Arista Networks Inc. suddenly finds itself in the crosshairs of a market shift it didn’t see coming . Nvidia (NVDA), the leader in AI chips, is now setting its sights on the Ethernet turf .  Santa Clara-based Arista Networks (ANET) is a leading player in cloud networking, specializing in high-performance Ethernet switches for large-scale data centers and enterprise environments . ANET stock has dipped by 12.9% in 2025 due to a mix of rising competitive pressure, shifting demand, and macroeconomic uncertainty .  Arista Networks reported a stronger-than-expected first quarter of 2025 on May 6, crossing $2 billion in revenue for the first time . GAAP profits hit $813.8 million or $0.64 a share, while non-GAAP earnings reached $826.2 million . New innovations, like Cluster Load Balancing, enhanced observability tools tailored for AI, helped seal deals and expand customer base .  Non-GAAP gross margin came in at 64.1%, just a hair shy of Q4 levels . Cash from operations climbed to $641.7 million, up from $513.8 million a year ago . A $787 million stock buyback, plus a fresh $1.5 billion authorization, added extra shine .  The average analyst price target for ANET is $110.95, indicating potential upside of 15%, while the Street-high target price of $130 suggests that the stock could rally as much as 35% . Arista stock has a consensus “Moderate Buy” rating overall, as analysts remain cautiously optimistic .  Sristi Suman Jayaswal did not have (either directly or indirectly) positions in any of the securities mentioned in this article . This article was originally published onBarchart.com .

Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) is back in the spotlight after a new partnership with HCLTech . Wall Street has taken notice, pointing to AMD’s narrowing gap with Nvidia and expanding customer base in high-growth segments like AI and cloud computing . Melius Research upgraded AMD to “Buy” and hiked its price target to $175 .  Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) has built a strong reputation in high-performance and adaptive computing . AMD trades at a forward-price-earnings ratio of 43.7x, much higher than the sector average of 22x . In the first quarter of 2025, AMD brought in $7.4 billion in revenue, up 36% from last year .  AMD's next phase is being shaped by more than just new chips . The company’s plans now reach beyond 2027, showing it wants to stay a leader in AI hardware and software . The growing ROCm ecosystem and new rack-scale designs show AMD is serious .  AMD expects revenue to come in around $7.4 billion in the second quarter of 2025 . Melius Research recently upgraded AMD from “Hold’ to “Buy” and raised its price target to $175 . The firm sees a lot of excitement building for AMD’s GPU .  AMD's historic run is fueled by real momentum in AI and data center growth . 42 analysts give AMD a consensus “Moderate Buy” rating, with an average price target of $133.73 . If AMD reaches the $175 target set by Melius, that would mean a roughly 23% gain from where it is now .  This article was originally published on Barchart.com . All information and data in this article is solely for informational purposes. of the securities mentioned in the article .

Jamba is now integrated with HPE Private Cloud AI, giving enterprises an easy, secure way to run powerful language models in their own data centers . AI21 is a pioneer in frontier models and AI systems and HPE Unleash AI partner, today announced that its Jamba 1.6 model is now available as a validated offering .  Jamba 1.6 on HPE Private Cloud AI offers enterprise teams a turnkey deployment experience . It delivers best-in-class latency and long-context processing . Built with enterprise-grade security in mind, Jamba ensures that sensitive data stays fully behind the firewall .  Jamba is already powering mission-critical workloads in sectors like finance, healthcare, and legal . AI21 is now doubling down on its commitment to private deployments by making it easier for enterprise teams to build and scale safely behind their own firewalls . NVIDIA’s NVDA data center graphics processing units (GPUs) for artificial intelligence (AI) tasks have boosted its business . Department of Defense, the U.S. Army, the Marine Corps, and the National Science Foundation, among others, receive custom AI-powered solutions from C3.ai .  C3.ai’s revenues in FY 2025 reached $389.1 million, a 25% increase from the previous year . Partnership withBaker Hughes CompanyBKR drove sales higher . Projections for FY 2026 suggest sales between $447.5 and $484.5 million .  NVIDIA stock is expected to outperform C3.ai’s due to its stronger profitability and market position . NVIDIA became the most valuable company worldwide on Wednesday, with shares reaching a record high of $154.31 .  C3.ai currently has a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy) stock . The company has diversification. enabling it to meet financial obligations and reduce vulnerability to potential defense budget cuts under the Trump administration through diversification .

AI firm CoreWeave raised $1.5 billion in its IPO, but CEO Michael Intrator's net worth has skyrocketed to about $10 billion . The AI firm offers AI training and inference cloud services built upon a growing stockpile of Nvidia GPUs .  CoreWeave's stock has soared almost 300% since its March IPO, raising Intrator’s net worth to above $10 billion . Intrator started out as a make-money-quick, crypto mining enterprise when their previous company, a hedge fund, failed . Today, the company is servicing the biggest LLM players on the planet .  CoreWeave remains a symbol of the AI industry in 2025: Massive, fast-growing revenue and investor enthusiasm built on an insatiable need for more resources .
Tech stocks were higher Thursday afternoon, with the Technology Select Sector SPDR Fund (XLK) up 0.6 . Tech stocks rose 0.5% Thursday afternoon .

Super Micro Computer jumped by 8.8 percent on Wednesday to close at $46.61 apiece . Nvidia Corp.’s rally spilled over to stocks riding the AI wave, including data centers and quantum computers . In other news, Super Micro . Computer, Inc. announced plans to raise $2 billion in fresh funds through the issuance of convertible senior notes .  The notes will mature on June 15, 2030, unless earlier redeemed, repurchased, or converted . Proceeds from the offer will be used to fund the cost of entering into the capped call transactions, while $200 million will be allocated for a share buyback program .  Short-term AI stock is one of the best AI stocks to buy in the world . The company has been in the news of a number of high-profile AI stocks in the U.S.

Coherent Corp. rallied by 5.77 percent on Wednesday to finish at $85.63 apiece . The rally echoed the rally in stocks riding the Artificial Intelligence boom following technology giant Nvidia Corp.’s surge to a new all-time high .  Coherent Corp. outlined its targets at its shareholders’ meeting recently, including a gross margin higher than 42 percent and an operating margin above 24 percent . By 2028, the company could achieve an EPS of around $8-9, a substantial increase from forecasts of under $4 in fiscal 2025 .

NVIDIA Corp. saw its share prices rally to a new all-time high on Wednesday after earning a whopping $250 price target from an investment firm . Loop Capital raised its price target by 47 percent to $250 from $170 previously . Growth prospects are further supported by an expected higher spending on generative AI by hyperscalers, namely Amazon, Microsoft, and Google .  Loop Capital expects NVIDIA Corporation to nearly double its market capitalization to $6 trillion from $3.6 trillion currently . Some AI stocks hold greater promise for delivering higher returns and have limited downside risk .

NVIDIA's share price rose by 38%, outpacing the market's 12% increase over the past year . NVIDIArecently announced significant collaborations with companies such as Cyngn and SHI International .  NVIDIA's 38% share price increase over the last quarter outperformed the broader market's 12% increase in the past year . Over the past five years, NVIDIA's total shareholder return was very large at 1524.54%, illustrating its strong long-term performance . NVIDIA's collaborations and technology advancements could enhance revenue and earnings capabilities, as analysts predict annual growth in these areas . 2CRSi announces the signing of a strategic contract for the supply of dedicated Artificial Intelligence servers in the state of New York, USA . The servers supplied incorporate the latest NVIDIA H200 GPUs, specifically designed to accelerate the most demanding workloads in artificial intelligence, high-performance computing, and inference .  The servers will be delivered in two stages, during July and August . This contract coincides with the start of 2CRSi's new fiscal year beginning July 1 .  2CRSi has been listed since June 2018 on the Euronext Paris regulated market (ISIN code: FR0013341781) Seitosei.Actifin. manufactures high-performance computer servers and innovative solutions for Artificial Intelligence .

Nvidia should remain a fixture in AI for the foreseeable future . AI is driving cloud growth for Amazon, and could eventually cut costs in its e-commerce operations . Meta Platforms continues to invest in AI using its deep pockets, funded by a lucrative ad business .  Nvidia owns an estimated 92% of the AI data center GPU market . The push to build artificial intelligence infrastructure went into overdrive in late 2022 . There is a good chance that computing resources will expand beyond data centers to localized areas where they can power new technologies .  Nvidia's price-to-earnings (P/E) ratio is 47 today . Analysts estimate Nvidia will grow earnings by nearly 29% annualized over the long term . Amazon is poised to be arguably the biggest beneficiary of AI innovation .  Amazon's e-commerce sales are already massive, reaching a whopping $387 billion in North America alone last year . Over 3.4 billion people log into its social media apps each day, including Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, and Threads . Wall Street expects the company to grow earnings by over 15% annually over the long term .  Meta's social media dominance makes the stock a strong buy at 27 times earnings . The company recently announced a massive $14.3 billion investment for a 49% stake in Scale AI . Meta is unveiling new smart glasses through partnerships with Oakley and Prada . The No Adversarial AI Act would keep Chinese-made AI tools out of federal government systems . DeepSeek grabbed headlines in January by claiming it matched leading models from OpenAI at a fraction of the cost and GPU usage .  A former Chinese Communist Party official this week predicted China could produce 100 DeepSeek-style breakthroughs over the next 18 months . Investors quickly shrugged off concerns and sent AI-linked stocks higher .

Semiconductor giant Nvidia (NVDA) has solidified its position as the world's most valuable company, achieving a market capitalization of $3.77 trillion . In the month of June alone, NVDA has gained a staggering 15.16% - easily outstripping its average return of 1.31% for the month since 2010 . NVDA stock reached a new record high of $156.71 earlier today .  Nvidia isn’t expected to report quarterly earnings until late August, and the stock has averaged a positive return of 3.03% in July dating back to 2010 . Last year’s 5.28% July selloff was a notable divergence from historical averages .  Nvidia's technological leadership remains unchallenged, with nearly 100 Nvidia-powered AI factories now in progress . The broader AI infrastructure market shows tremendous potential, with data center spending projected to grow from $455 billion in 2024 to $1.1 trillion by 2029 . The company maintains impressive margins above 70%, despite product launches and market challenges .  Nvidia's dominance in AI computing hardware continues to strengthen, with analysts projecting the AI chip market to grow to $2 trillion by 2028 . Trading at 37.7 times forward earnings and 18.8 times forward sales, NVDA stock appears reasonably valued compared to Wall Street’s growth projections . Technical traders will note that NVDA looks short-term overbought, based on a break above its upper Bollinger Band and a 14-day Relative Strength Index reading above 74 .  bulls may soon have an opportunity to pick up Nvidia shares on a pullback to technical support . current levels, and bulls could soon have a chance to buy Nvidia shares . The shares are currently trading around $6,000 per day .

Nvidia figures to be a primary beneficiary of the AI boom for years to come . Taiwan Semiconductor will grow as the world uses more chips . Netflix still has a lot of long-term upside as streaming expands .  If artificial intelligence is going to create trillions of dollars in economic value over the coming years, Nvidia could continue to perform . The company has cornered the market for data center GPU chips, with an estimated 92% market share .  Unless Nvidia loses its edge in AI, analysts see the company growing earnings by an average of 29% annually over the long term . Nvidia has additional long-term opportunities to expand beyond data centers, to areas like robotics, where computing power would be needed at a localized level .  Taiwan Semiconductor has a wide competitive moat and a 67% revenue share of the global foundry market . It comes with geopolitical risks associated with long-standing geopolitical tensions between China and Taiwan . Analysts estimate the company will grow earnings by over 21% annually over the long term, making the stock a bargain at 26 times earnings .  Netflix has amassed a global presence with over 301 million paid subscribers at the end of last year . Netflix has become increasingly profitable as its membership fees grow faster than what it spends to produce content . The streaming giant trades at a hefty P/E ratio of 58 .  Analysts expect Netflix to grow earnings by an average of 22% annually over the next three to five years . At this growth rate, I could see Netflix doubling or tripling over next decade . Nvidia (NVDA) stock rose to its record high, surging past the $150 price level yesterday, June 25 . It has been a remarkable turnaround for the chip designing giant . Nvidia is now back to being the world’s most valuable company, a position it has held off and on .  Nvidia stock has hit record highs after a stellar Q1 2026 earnings report . The company beat on both the top line and bottom line and provided upbeat guidance . Nvidia’s mean target price is $174.83, while the most recent Street-high target price (via Loop Capital) is $250 .  Nvidia would need to rise over 29% for the stock to hit $200, sending its market cap to almost $5 trillion . The company is expected to generate revenues of almost $200 billion in the current fiscal year, 53% higher than the previous year . Another 25% rally will help Nvidia’s stock reach its Street-high target price of $250 .  Analysts are modelling Nvidia’s earnings per share to rise 36.7% in the current fiscal year . Nvidia trades at a forward price-earnings (P/E) multiple of almost 37x . If Nvidia were to rise to $200, it would trade at around 50x its expected EPS this year .  NVDA stock currently has momentum, and I don't see any immediate risk to the rally, barring a macroeconomic shock . The next trigger for Nvidia could be a potential easing of China export restrictions, or the company coming up with a new chip that it can export under the current set of rules . Overall, I would not rule out the possibility of Nvidia stock rising above $200, if not this year, then in the coming year .

(NASDAQ:NVDA) is a leading innovator in the design and production of graphics processing units (GPUs), system-on-a-chip (SoC) solutions, and AI-driven hardware and software . CyngnInc. stock surged on Thursday after the company announced its partnership with Nvidia Corp. to showcase its autonomous industrial vehicles at Automatica 2025 . The collaboration highlights how the company is leveraging the Nvidia Isaac robotics platform to power next-generation autonomous vehicle solutions for industrial applications .  Cyngn stock plunged 100% in the last 12 months as it grappled with financial challenges and concerns about its ability to meet Nasdaq’s minimum bid price requirement . It regained Nasdaq compliance in March 2025 . The company missed the revenue and EPS consensus analyst estimates in the past four quarters .  Nvidia has announced a partnership with Amazon in the U.S. for cloud computing . The company has been in talks with the tech giant over the years with Apple .

Marvell Technology nosedived earlier this year after providing disappointing guidance . Tariffs and economic uncertainty continue to weigh on the California-based chipmaker . Its valuation has come way down, which could make it more appealing now to investors .  Despite a huge opportunity in AI, Marvell's stock hasn't been doing well of late . Could it be a bargain buy in a red-hot AI market, or are there problems that should keep you away from buying this stock right now?  Shares of Marvell were already beginning to decline before its guidance miss earlier in the year, likely due to its inflated valuation . Currently, Marvell stock trades at a forward P/E of 26, which is only slightly higher than the 23 times the average stock on the S&P 500 .  Given the ongoing investments into AI and the need for custom AI chips, Marvell is a stock that can bounce back and generate good returns . Palantir Technologies shares have rallied nearly 300% since October . Short interest in the software maker is about 2%, down from a high of 5% in October . Shares extended that gain in early trading Thursday, rising as much as 3.7% on track for a record close .  Palantir is the best-performing stock in the S&P 500 this year . It's also the most expensive in the benchmark with a price to estimated sales ratio of 76 times . Nvidia Corp. is priced at 17 times .  Palantir’s work with government and military customers has been in particular focus in recent sessions as US strikes on nuclear facilities in Iran raised the specter of a broader conflict in the Middle East . The Denver-based company is expected to see sales jump 36% this year .  Palantir is one of the fastest growing companies in the Nasdaq 100 . Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said robotics is the company's second-largest growth opportunity . Autonomous vehicles will likely be the first major real-world use case for the technology . Nvidia shares climbed Wednesday following the news, reaching an all-time high and boosting its market capitalization to approximately $3.75 trillion . Nvidia (NVDA) stock continued to tick higher Thursday, rising about 0.5% . The gains come amid bullish predictions for the AI chip market on Wall Street . Loop Capital analyst Ananda Baruah on Wednesday raised his price target on Nvidia shares to $250 .  Bank of America analyst Vivek Arya says demand for AI chips will reach $650 billion by 2030 . He says Nvidia is set to be a "key beneficiary" as it's "still far ahead" of new entrants in the sector . Micron beat Wall Street's expectations for its third quarter earnings results .  Before its high Wednesday, Nvidia last hit a record close of $149.43 on Jan. 6 . Shares have seen a big upswing since the company announced trade deals in the Middle East and reported its first quarter earnings in late May .  The U.S. stock market is one of the fastest growing markets in the world, according to Goldman Sachs . Goldman Sachs is the fastest-growing market in the United States, with more than 1,000 investors in the market .

Chip giant Broadcom (AVGO) has quietly and steadily become a key player behind the curtain in artificial intelligence . Broadcom’s strength lies in its highly specialized application-specific integrated circuits (ASICs) which power the custom AI chips used by tech leaders like Alphabet (GOOGL) and Meta (META)  HSBC has a new Street-high price target of $400 for Broadcom . Broadcom spans semiconductors, enterprise software, and cybersecurity, offering a broad portfolio that supports critical technology infrastructure . With a market capitalization hovering around $1.2 trillion, Broadcom has shown impressive strength in 2025 .  AVGO stock has surged with a 14% YTD climb . Shares have surged 40% over the past three months alone . Broadcom's 67% return dwarfs the S&P 500’s 11% gain . The chip giant posted revenue of $15 billion in its fiscal 2025 second-quarter earnings report .  Broadcom's software segment, which includes VMware, also delivered a strong performance . Q2 revenue alone reached $4.4 billion, marking a 46% YOY increase . CEO Hock Tan said the company is targeting $5.1 billion in AI chip sales for the third quarter .  HSBC upgraded AVGO stock to “Buy” from “Hold” and set a new price target of $400 . The investment firm sees Broadcom as a major beneficiary of rising investment from hyperscalers in custom AI chips . HSBC believes Broadcom’s potential in this space is still underappreciated and could drive significant upside .  AVGO stock’s average analyst price target of $288 indicates only 9% potential upside from current price levels . HSBC's ambitious $400 target suggests that the stock can rally as much as 51% from here .

NVDL is an ETF that aims to double Nvidia’s daily gains . But it resets itself on a daily basis, doubles its losses, and charges high fees . Nvidia's stock rose about 16% over the past 12 months, even as the company grappled with tighter export curbs .  The Granite Shares ETF might be an appealing investment for two reasons . It can help short-term traders generate big gains from any news or earnings-driven rallies for Nvidia . The NVDA Daily ETF might sound like a good way to profit from Nvidia's gains, but it has three glaring weaknesses .  The NVDA Daily ETF has been a terrible investment for the long term . Over the past 12 months, its shares actually declined 17% even as Nvidia's stock rose . The fund makes adjustments every day to meet its investment objective . For long-term investors, it would be cheaper to simply buy Nvidia stock directly or invest in a low-cost ETF .  The GraniteShares 2x Long NVDA Daily ETF targets greedy investors and doesn't seem like a better buy than Nvidia . It's designed for day traders, it charges high fees, and it will likely underperform Nvidia over the long term . If you're bullish on Nvidia, you should simply buy its stock . Iambic Therapeutics has selected Lambda to provide an NVIDIA HGX B200 cluster to support the training of Enchant, its industry-leading model for molecular property prediction . Enchant enables researchers to determine the viability of new drug molecules and make high-confidence predictions where data is most sparse .  Enchant’s high-confidence predictions enable multi-parameter optimization for the design of potentially more effective medicines, program prioritization, and design of clinical trials for the potentially rapid translation of novel medicines . Iambic researchers demonstrated that in some cases Enchant can be a better predictor ofin some cases .  The Iambic AI-driven platform was created to address the most challenging design problems in drug discovery, leveraging technology innovations such as Enchant . Enchant is the leading model in the field based on performance benchmarks across diverse molecular property prediction tasks .  Iambic Therapeutics is a clinical-stage life-science and technology company developing novel medicines using its AI-driven discovery and development platform . The integration of physics principles into the platform’s AI architecture improves data efficiency .  The Iambic platform has demonstrated delivery of new drug candidates to human clinical trials with unprecedented speed and across multiple target classes and mechanisms of action . Lambda was founded in 2012 by AI engineers with published research at the top machine learning conferences in the world .  As well as electricity, the company is using the same amount of energy as electricity . The company has launched a series of successful commercial ventures in the world .

ZDNET recently ranked DeepL the #3 most popular AI tools globally, ahead of Perplexity AI, Google Translate, Gemini and Deepseek .  DeepL is on a mission to break down language barriers for businesses and individuals everywhere . Over 200,000 customers and millions of individuals across 228 global markets trust DeepL's Language AI platform for human-like translation in both written and spoken formats . Shares of Super Micro Computer (NASDAQ:SMCI) surged nearly9% during Wednesday trading, marking their largest single-day move in over a month . Nvidia (NASDAQ:NVDA) shares surged more than4% on Wednesday, closing at $154.31 after touching an all-time high . The rally lifted the chipmaker's market cap to approximately $3.76 trillion, once again making it the mostvaluable publicly traded company .  Loop Capital's Ananda Baruah lifted Nvidia's price target to $250 from $175 . The analyst cited accelerating spending on hyperscale infrastructure and AI, which could reach $2 trillion by 2028 . The company's most recent earnings report showed a 69% year-over-year revenue jump .

Shares of Nvidia Corp. reached a new record high on Thursday in premarket trading . The uptick follows Wednesday’s all-time high closing price of $154.31 . The chipmaker's current ascension was fueled in part by Loop Capital’s decision yesterday to raise its price target from $175 to $250 .
